pageContext.claim: “You know, they go from having record-breaking years -- this is the third year of record-breaking years -- travel and tourism, airlines, everything.”
pageContext.analysis: The World Tourism Organization reported travel by sea and rail was about the same in 2017 and 2018. Tourism receipts were up by about five percent in 2018 — the same amount as 2017. They have fluctuated between three and five percent since 2010, hardly a record increase.
